## Workgroup, now

In groups, write down the following tasks regarding the project (10')

* Research question / goals
* Define a plan for the following weeks: 
  * Outline which methods from the provided ones are you planning to use to answer your question
  * Plan considering the calendar and identify how much time you'll need to work on your own time

One member of the group will share their plan with the class (10')
